item.title: In the Beginning*
item.description: This is the first real post that I intend to publish on a blog that should have been, at least since yesteryear. Alas, a lack of motivation or discipline for seeing through the smaller things obscures The Way. Let it be, allow the things you see to lead. The words will weave the way if you don’t forget to speak. Yet, you see. It’s nothing new to you or me! Echoes of words and their meanings meandering through open ears, open minds.
